attributes.action: BAN DRINK DRIVERS FROM THE ROAD AS SOON AS THEY GIVE A POSITIVE BREATH TEST AND NOT WAITING FOR THEIR APPEARANCE IN COURT.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: AS YOU MAY BE AWARE MY COUSIN CARL BLACKBURN WAS KILLED IN A CAR CRASH BY A DRINK DRIVER. I AM HELPING DAWN FERGUSON TO CHANGE THE LAW ON DRINK DRIVERS FROM THE ROAD AS SOON AS THEY GIVE A POSITIVE BREATH TEST AND NOT WAITING FOR THEIR APPEARANCE IN COURT.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
